template<typename T>
void cinder::AreaT< T >::expand ( T  expandX,
T  expandY 
)

Expands the AreaT by expandX horizontally and expandY vertically. expandX is subtracted from x1 and added to x2 and expandY is subtracted from y1 and added to y2.
